context_bundle.summary: Grafana is an open-source visualization platform for monitoring, observability, and analytics with support for multiple data sources

onboarding.quick_start: helm install grafana grafana/grafana --namespace monitoring --set adminPassword='admin123' && kubectl get secret grafana -n monitoring -o jsonpath='{.data.admin-password}' | base64 --decode
common_patterns: Installation: helm install grafana grafana/grafana -n monitoring with persistence enabled
Datasource configuration: grafana-cli plugins install grafana-prometheus-datasource
Alerting: Alert rule with 'FOR: 5m' and notification channels
Users and teams: grafana-cli admin user create --email user@example.com --password password123
known_errors: Datasource not working: 'curl http://grafana:3000/api/datasources' and verify PROMETHEUS_URL and authentication
Dashboard not loading: 'curl -X GET http://grafana:3000/api/dashboards/uid/<uid>' and check JSON schema
Permission denied: 'grafana-cli admin user permissions' and verify organization role assignments
Plugin installation failed: 'grafana-cli plugins install-data-source' and check plugin compatibility
High memory usage: 'kubectl exec -n monitoring grafana-0 -- lsof' and reduce dashboard refresh intervals
